Title: Establishes a rebuttable presumption of a hate crime when certain crimes are committed on, in or upon a house of worship
Summary: Establishes a rebuttable presumption of a hate crime when certain crimes are committed on, in or upon a house of worship.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing a rebuttable presumption of a hate crime when certain crimes are committed on, in or upon a house of worship
